detectors.description: BlockchainLottery.drawLottery() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x72aca5cd2cc95983ebb82d7130fd7ffd0ef29bca-BlockchainLottery.sol#230-240) uses a weak PRNG: roundWinner = ticketHolders[winningLotteryNumber] (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x72aca5cd2cc95983ebb82d7130fd7ffd0ef29bca-BlockchainLottery.sol#235)

BlockchainLottery.randomNum(uint256,uint256,uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x72aca5cd2cc95983ebb82d7130fd7ffd0ef29bca-BlockchainLottery.sol#213-216) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: num = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp,msg.sender,_seed,_salt))) % _mod (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x72aca5cd2cc95983ebb82d7130fd7ffd0ef29bca-BlockchainLottery.sol#214)
